remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about security tokens and certificates, for example, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.WrappedKeySecurityToken>, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens>.
For information about security topics that overlap with the service model, for example, <xref:System.ServiceModel.TcpTransportSecurity>, see <xref:System.ServiceModel>.
